statements: DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE user_id = 100 AND page_views > 50;
DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE page_views > 100 AND conversion_rate < 0.5;
DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE user_id = 1001 AND visit_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE website_id = 1 AND traffic_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE unique_visitors > 1000 AND page_views < 5000;
DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM conversion_rates WHERE product_id = 100 AND date < '2022-01-01';
